title: Nocturnal Dreams: A Chopin Journey
description: An intimate exploration of Frédéric Chopin's nocturnes, those moonlit masterpieces that transformed the piano into a vessel for pure emotion. Performed by Adam Harasiewicz, winner of the 1955 International Chopin Piano Competition.

tracklist.title: Nocturne No. 1 in B flat minor, Op. 9 No. 1
Nocturne No. 2 in E flat major, Op. 9 No. 2
Nocturne No. 7 in C sharp minor, Op. 27 No. 1
Nocturne No. 8 in D flat major, Op. 27 No. 2
Nocturne No. 13 in C minor, Op. 48 No. 1
Nocturne No. 20 in C sharp minor, Op. posth.
